name: Jimmy Daywalt
introduction: James "Jimmy" Daywalt (August 28 1924 - April 4 1966) was a driver from the United States. Born inWabash, Indiana, he drove in theAAAandUSACChampionship Carseries, racing in the 1950, 19531957, 1959, and 19611962 seasons with 20 starts. He finished in the top ten 3 times. His best finish was in the1953 Indianapolis 500, where he finished 6th and was named Rookie of the Year.
